changeSet.author: patrick_schmitz
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO language_source (category, message, id) SELECT 'app' AS category, 'Import via Copy & Paste' AS message, (SELECT MAX(id)+1 FROM language_source) AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_source WHERE message='Import via Copy & Paste') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'de-DE' AS "language", 'Import via Kopieren & Einf端gen' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Import via Copy & Paste') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Import via Kopieren & Einf端gen' AND "language"='de-DE') UNION ALL SELECT 'de-MS_SSRS' AS "language", 'Import via Kopieren & Einf端gen' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Import via Copy & Paste') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Import via Kopieren & Einf端gen' AND "language"='de-MS_SSRS') ;

INSERT INTO language_source (category, message, id) SELECT 'app' AS category, 'Export all tables as CSV' AS message, (SELECT MAX(id)+1 FROM language_source) AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all tables as CSV') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'de-DE' AS "language", 'Alle Tabellen als CSV exportieren' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all tables as CSV') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Alle Tabellen als CSV exportieren' AND "language"='de-DE') UNION ALL SELECT 'de-MS_SSRS' AS "language", 'Alle Datasets (und Tabellen) als CSV exportieren' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all tables as CSV') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Alle Datasets (und Tabellen) als CSV exportieren' AND "language"='de-MS_SSRS') ;

INSERT INTO language_source (category, message, id) SELECT 'app' AS category, 'Export all tables with fields as CSV' AS message, (SELECT MAX(id)+1 FROM language_source) AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all tables with fields as CSV') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'de-DE' AS "language", 'Alle Tabellen mit Feldern als CSV exportieren' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all tables with fields as CSV') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Alle Tabellen mit Feldern als CSV exportieren' AND "language"='de-DE') UNION ALL SELECT 'de-MS_SSRS' AS "language", 'Alle Datasets (und Tabellen) mit Feldern als CSV exportieren' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all tables with fields as CSV') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Alle Datasets (und Tabellen) mit Feldern als CSV exportieren' AND "language"='de-MS_SSRS') ;

INSERT INTO language_source (category, message, id) SELECT 'app' AS category, 'Export all keyfigures as XML' AS message, (SELECT MAX(id)+1 FROM language_source) AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all keyfigures as XML') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'de-DE' AS "language", 'Alle Kennzahlen als XML exportieren' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all keyfigures as XML') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Alle Kennzahlen als XML exportieren' AND "language"='de-DE') UNION ALL SELECT 'de-MS_SSRS' AS "language", 'Alle Kennzahlen als XML exportieren' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all keyfigures as XML') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Alle Kennzahlen als XML exportieren' AND "language"='de-MS_SSRS') ;

INSERT INTO language_source (category, message, id) SELECT 'app' AS category, 'Export all keyfigures as JSON' AS message, (SELECT MAX(id)+1 FROM language_source) AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all keyfigures as JSON') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'de-DE' AS "language", 'Alle Kennzahlen als JSON exportieren' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all keyfigures as JSON') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Alle Kennzahlen als JSON exportieren' AND "language"='de-DE') UNION ALL SELECT 'de-MS_SSRS' AS "language", 'Alle Kennzahlen als JSON exportieren' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Export all keyfigures as JSON') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Alle Kennzahlen als JSON exportieren' AND "language"='de-MS_SSRS') ;
UPDATE language_translate SET "translation" = 'Tabelle und Felder aktualisieren' WHERE "translation" = 'Aktualisiere Datenkontainer und Attribute' ;
changeSet.comment: Updates/new translations Used objects: language_translate Phabricator tasks: T259, T260
